naththan ohege dannathi kamada?pansal idam balahath karayen allana eka pirith damimata thahanam kirima, aithihasika watinakamakin yuth sthana winasha kirima, mewa yukthi sahagathada?para meken panala yana bawa mama dannawa uththara denna bayayane?mema karunu pasubimehi pela gasena wita 1915 mayi masa 28 dina polisiye ha adala baladharinge awasaraya matha thuryawadaka kandayamak kasalhil widiye gaman karana athara ee wana wita margaye aarakshawata siti kure nam polis niladhariya wadana kandayamwalata ee widiyen gaman kirima thahanam bawa pawasa harawa yawiya.ee yana gamaneyara 120k pamana eha yonaka palliyaka sitina janaya mema bathi gi kandayamata saha thurya wadakayanta kala saradam iwasa gatha nohi harawa yawu kandayamak nawatha pera giya desatama gaman karannata wiya.bathi gi kandayama pasu pasa giya bauddhayanta marakkalayan gal gasimata patan gath heyin udahasata path wu bauddhayan da muwarwarunge palliyata hani kaleya.meya hethuwa kara ganimin ratha්riye da athi wu gatum dina dekak pura mayi masa 30 wana dina dakwa pawathuni.eyin atham aya athadanguwata path wu athara thawath aya siragatha wiya.polisiyata kolahalaya sansidawagatha nohaki wuyen panjab hamudawa kandawana ladi.juli 01 wana dina eya kolambaa enam, basnahira palathata pathirunu athara eelaga dinayehi dakuna,madhyama,uthura manda,sabaragamuwa aadi palathwalata da pathira giyeya.awasanaye dina 09kata pasu juni 06 wani dina kolahalaya palanaya kala da pana wu yudha nithiya iwath karana ladde agosthu masa 30 wanidaya.uputa ganima wiki

senasuruge paminima siwiwanna wethatayi.thama sitha damanaya karamin katayuthu karanna.pahasuwen ෙbirumi karagatha hakiwa athi karunu kalabalawimen wishala karadara bawata pathwiya haki kalayak nisa nuwanathiwa buddhayen katayuthu karanna.su`e waradakata wuwa wishala daduwami himi wiya haki kalayaki.

ehidi prithipaththiya niyojanaya kala gurukulaya paradawa paryapthiya niyojanaya kala gurukulaya jaya athpath karaganimada me yugaye siduwu samaja aakalpa pariwarthanaya kadimata ismathu karannaki.ehidi thriipitaka dharmaya anugamanaya kirimata wada kadapadamin aaraksha karaganime wadagathkama ismathuwu bawini.me adahase wadagathkama wadath dadiwa awadharanayawimath samangama bhikshutha samajaye awadhanayada ee kerehi yomuwannata wiya.me hethuwa mathama wanawasi ha grasamawasi yana namin bhikshuwa samajaya sanwidhanaya wannata wiya.wanawasi kotasa hudek pramathipaththiya ha prathiwedhaya pinisa diwi kapakara kriayakarannata wu athara graimawasi kotasa paryapthiya wadi awadharanayakin gena katayuthu kirimata wiya.paryapthiya mulika karagena katayuthu kala gra mawasi samprudaya wadath samany minisun samanga sambandhawi minisunge melowa paralowa sugathiya sandaha kapawi kriayakaraddi minisunda gramawasi bhikshuun wahanselata wada samipa wannata wiya.in gihipawidi sambandhathawa wadath lanwiya.wanawasi sampraladaya huruwa thibune hakithak samanyawa minis asurin wenwa widarshana bhawanawa wada haki ikmanin manga pala shakshakath kirimataya.me adahasa samanyawa laukika katayuthuwala yedi ee samangama melowa paralowa sugathigamiwime aramuna peradariwa kritayakala gihi pirisage kamaththata samagami nowina.ee nisa samanyara gihi pirisa wanawasi sampredayata wada grayamawasi samprathadayata wadath samipa wimata pramabala hethuwak wiya.kalgathawimedi sthawirawadi aakalpayata wada bududahama sambandhawa yam yam wya thireka aakalpa sahitha nikayanthara bauddha aakalpada meratathula wyanapthawannata wiya.ebandu aakalpawala thamage wimukthiya udesa kapawimata wada samajaye anyayange wimukthiya udesa kapawi katayuthu karana bodhisathw charyawa paramadarshayak washayen wadath usaskota salakini.ee nisa sthawirawadin aathmarthakamin lesath bodhisathwadha paramadarshaya anuwa pothpath liyamin ee samanga samanyawa minisunge melowaparalowa sugathiya udesa apakapawi krithayakala nikayanthara adahas anuwa kriyakala gurukula pararthakamin lesath huwa dakwana wiwidha aakalpa bahulawa samajaya thula wyanaptha wannata wiya.prthipaththigarukawimata wada aamisha labhiwa samanyu minisun asure jiwath wima wada pahasu jiwana margayak bawin eeta lolwu pudgalayin wisin wada wadath mebandu aakalpa mathawadiwa poshanaya kirima pinisa pathapotha rachanakaramin dayakawima me yugaye widya mana kapi penena siduwimak bawa sandahankala hakiya.

shri lankawata wideshadhara labim siyayata 24kin wadiwi athayi mudal amathyanshaye saha maha bhandagaraye lekam aacharya pi. bi. jayasundara mahatha prakasha keleya.wasara 2005 mahinda rajapaksha mahatha me rate paswani widhayaka janadhipathiwaraya bawata pathwimen pasu gathawu kalasimawe me andamata wideshadhara ha naya labim wardhanaya wu bawada lekamwaraya kiya.mesa wishala mudal pramanayak ratata adi eemath samanga rate sanwardhana katayuthu wegawath wu bawada jayasundara mahatha pahadili keleya.wideshadhara labim yodagena aanduwa ratapura marga, adhiwegi marga ha palam, balashakthi, waraya, jalasampadana, warimarga ha dumriya yanadi aarthika yatithala pahasukam wadidiyunu kirime wishala wyapruthi kriyathmaka karana bawada lekamwaraya sandahan keleya.shri lankawata me andamata wideshadhara labim wadiwimata hethuwa apa kalata welawata widesha nayawala warika ha poliya aapasu gewana nisa bawada jayasundara mahatha pahadili keleya.wasara 2012 janawari sita mul masa ata athulatha rajaya athi kara gath wideshadhara ekangatha pramanaya eksath janapada dolar miliyana 2897.95ki.
